casebody.data:
GREGORY
v.
W.A. BROWN & PMA Ins. No. 447A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 24, 2008. William D. Acton, Jr., Charlotte, for Gregory.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 664 S.E.2d 589.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of September 2008 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

*469"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of September 2008."
